item.title: Git command ì •ë¦¬
item.description: GIT ì—°ìŠµ Site # http://learngitbranching.js.org/ https://backlogtool.com/git-guide/kr/ $ level - ì—°ìŠµë¬¸ì œ ì´ˆê¸° í™”ë©´ (ë¬¸ì œì„ íƒ) $ sandbox - ë¹ˆ ì—°ìŠµ $ show solution - í•´ë‹¹ë³´ê¸° $ reset - í•´ë‹¹ level ì²˜ìŒë¶€í„° ë‹¤ì‹œ $ undo - 1ê°œ ëª…ë ¹ ì·¨ì†Œ $ git fakeTeamwork 1 - origin ì— 1ê°œ ì»¤ë°‹ ë„£ê¸° 1ï¸âƒ£ Set up # $ git clone -b [ë¸Œëœì¹˜ | tag] [REPO URL] $ git remote add orgin [REPO URL] // origin ìœ¼ë¡œ REPO URL ë“±ë¡ $ git remote rm orgin // origin ì‚­ì œ $ git submodule add [REPO RUL] [Local Folder Path] $ git submodule update // --init --recursive 2ï¸âƒ£ branch # $ git branch -f bugfix HEAD~1 : bugfix ë¸Œëœì¹˜ë¥¼ HEAD [í˜¹ì€ ë¸Œëœì¹˜ ëª…] 1ê°œ ì „ commitìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ë™ $ git branch -u origin/maser [Branch A] : ì´ë¯¸ ìˆëŠ” local Branch A (ìƒëµí•˜ë©´ í˜„ì¬ checkout branch) ê°€ origin/master ì„ trackí•¨ --> git checkout --track ê³¼ ë¹„êµ $ git branch -d Branch A : local ì—ì„œë§Œ Branch A ì‚­ì œ $ git branch -d -r origin/branch A : remote íŠ¸ë™í‚¹ ë¸Œëœì¹˜ë¥¼ ë¡œì»¬ì—ì„œ ì‚­ì œ (ì—, origin/featrue ) 3ï¸âƒ£ checkout # $ git checkout branch A : Remoteì— ìˆëŠ” branch A ì— ëŒ€í•´ local ì— branch A ì™€ origin/branch Aë§Œë“¤ê³ , checkout.

item.title: Python with Pyenv
item.description: Pyenv ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê¸° # $ pyenv versions * system (set by /home/june.sung/.pyenv/version) 2.7.17 $ pyenv install --list $ pyenv installÂ 3.6.9 * system (set by /home/june.sung/.pyenv/version) 2.7.17 3.6.9 $ pyenv shellÂ 3.6.9 $ pyenv which python 3.6.9 (set by PYENV_VERSION environment variable) # $ pyevn [ global > local > shell ] X.X.X # cat ~/.pyenv/version | cat .pyton-version | echo $PYENV_VERSION # loacal ì€ í•´ë‹¹ í´ë” ì•„ë˜ (set by ~í´ë”/.
